title: Sona wants a AP Sightstone
body: Lulu and Morg want one too

replies.body: Well, someone will probably say "If it has good stats on it, other lanes will buy it" to which I as a support main would say "Awesome! The more people on my team that have Sightstones, the more wards we have! What's not to love there?"
This, even if the enemy team starts using them against you more at least people are warding.

true, but the cost will probably increase as well, which wouldn't be that great, I would like to see them bring the ward active back to jungle items personally, I think one option they could look into is making sightstone an enchantment that could be applied to any non active item in the shop, it would allow you to have whatever stats on sightstone you wanted and people would have no excuse to skip wards late game.
I would totally buy an AP sightstone on an midlaner, lol

If we get an AP sightstone with good stats I will 100% buy it every time I go mid.

This, and if it was really cost effective, then it would be good for supports since they already have less gold to use in-between recalls.
Plus, warding is something I rarely do if I'm not support, so it would be very nice if there was something other than health given with the sightstone, or even the ruby sightstone.
Ruby sightstone would probably have to be changed to be the "enchantment" extension of the sightstone.
I sincerely doubt an item with AP in the 30-50 range is worth anything to AP stackers, though.

Soraka too.

Morgana... eh, kind of annoying...
But Lulu is not that bad. Lulu is easily beatable. 40% CDR Lulu is pretty strong, but I haven't played Morgana, so I have no idea what she's like in the late game.
And really that comes down to counter-picking. Any mobile champ should never get trapped by Morg, whereas Lulu's slow is felt the most on those same mobile champs.

I think it's just the *im*mobile champs that suffer from Lulu's slow and **especially** Morg's snare and whatnot, simply because they can't escape quick enough.
And if a Morgana sent a snare out and hit you, there's probably the rest of her team right behind her too.

Don't forget the sexy plant lady, Zyra!

My favourite support by far.

We could change exhaust to a support summoner spell or add a new one, similar to the way machete and smite work.
Give us three build paths.

One focuses on damage.
One focuses on tankiness.
One focuses on utility.

I know there's a thread somewhere about support items, and how it could get the S5 jungle treatment, not including gutting 90% of viable champs for that role.
tenacity sightstone

As a Sona main I prefer the health actually, Sona's scaling isn't that high, so most games being a bit less squishy is more useful than a bit of AP. Morg and Lulu don't really need the buff. What I'd want is a separate item slot just for wards/sightstone similar to what smite has.
